issue.title: DRCSIM recently stopped working with Intel graphics cards

content.raw: Yes ... the guys using intel-only laptops could put a modified atlas model at the beginning of the ``GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`` that uses the ODE ray sensor (i.e. ``ray`` instead of ``gpu_ray`` for the lidar type) ... you won't be able to use the lidar in task 2 (unless you're very patient and have a lot of time ;) ) and you'll get different lidar readings than the GPU version on models that have different visual and collision model but at least it won't crash.
